channel.title: Adding Nomad to my server, 74 errors

item.title: Adding Nomad to my server, 74 errors
item.dc:creator: @Decronix Decronix
item.description:
@Decronix wrote:

You should use a program like netbeans to edit with, as it’s much easier then.

src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:3834: error: ';' expected public void startAnimation(int animId, int i) { ^
It says NPCHandler.java:3834
that means the error is on line 3834.
Go check that line, and see what the problem is,
secondly,

error: ';' expected I think that’s self-explanatory.
You need a semicolon to end your statement.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding Nomad to my server, 74 errors

@iamlies wrote:

edit: no, nothing has happened major, lost two errors, think i am going to leave it
thanks for the help though

item.title: Adding Nomad to my server, 74 errors
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

First, put your code in code tags.
Second, remove the second closing brace after

c.sendMessage("You have been frozen.");

Read full topic
item.source: Adding Nomad to my server, 74 errors

item.title: Adding Nomad to my server, 74 errors
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

search for:

In npchandler.java
then look 1 line below it, it should say:

public void loadSpell(int i) {( i believe there is 2, so add it under the second one.

below that add that code, so it should look like:

public void loadSpell(int i) { case 8528: //NOmad int n5 = 0; int wrathDamage = c.playerLevel[3]/10 * 3; if (goodDistance(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killerId].absX, Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killerId].absY, 2)) n5 = Misc.random(1); else n5 = Misc.random(2); if (n5 == 0) { if(npcs[i].HP <= 15000 && npcs[i].HP >= 12500) { //Ice Barrage npcs[i].forceChat("Die now, in a prison of ice!"); npcs[i].forceAnim(6986);//barrage? npcs[i].attackType = 2; if (c.freezeTimer <= 0){ c.freezeTimer = 15; c.gfx0(369); c.sendMessage("You have been frozen."); } } } else if (n5 == 1) { //Smoke Barrage if(npcs[i].HP <= 25000 && npcs[i].HP >= 22500) { npcs[i].forceChat("Fill My Soul With Smoke!"); c.getPA().appendPoison(160); c.gfx0(391); npcs[i].attackType = 1; c.sendMessage("Nomad fills your lungs with a deathly smoke."); } } else if (n5 == 2) { //Shadow Barrage if(npcs[i].HP <= 20000 && npcs[i].HP >= 17500) { npcs[i].forceChat("Embrace Darkness!"); c.gfx0(382); npcs[i].attackType = 1; c.getPA().walkableInterface(12418); c.sendMessage("You're encased in a unholy shadow."); } } else if (n5 == 3) { //Blood Barrage if(npcs[i].HP <= 10000 && npcs[i].HP >= 7500) { npcs[i].HP += 185; npcs[i].attackType = 2; c.gfx0(377); c.sendMessage("Nomad Saps your health and increases his own."); } } else if (n5 == 4) { //Turmoil if(npcs[i].HP <= 5000 && npcs[i].HP >= 1000) { npcs[i].forceAnim(6326);//turm npcs[i].forceChat("There is...NO ESCAPE!"); npcs[i].hitDelayTimer += 2; } } else if (n5 == 5) { //Wrath if(npcs[i].HP <= 200 && npcs[i].HP >= 0) { npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee npcs[i].forceChat("Feel The Wrath Of ZAROS!!"); npcs[i].attackType = 1; npcs[i].forceAnim(2259);//Wrath c.gfx0(2260); c.playerLevel[3] -= wrathDamage; c.handleHitMask(wrathDamage); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); } } else if (n5 == 6) { //Normal Attack npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee npcs[i].attackType = 0; } else if (n5 == 7) { //First! if(npcs[i].HP <= 30000 && npcs[i].HP >= 29900) { npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee npcs[i].forceChat("AT LAST!!!!"); npcs[i].attackType = 1; }

and MAKE SURE, the cases and returns are INSIDE the switch statement.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Nomad to my server, 74 errors
item.dc:creator: @iamlies iamlies
item.description:
@iamlies wrote:

Hey, i’ve got all of these errors from trying to add nomad to my server from following a tutorial, Im using project insanity.

Here’s my code:

            case 8528: //NOmad
                    int n5 = 0;
                    int wrathDamage = c.playerLevel[3]/10 * 3;
                    if (goodDistance(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killerId].absX, Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killerId].absY, 2))
                            n5 = Misc.random(1);
                    else
                            n5 = Misc.random(2);
                    if (n5 == 0) {
                    if(npcs[i].HP <= 15000 && npcs[i].HP >= 12500) { //Ice Barrage
                            npcs[i].forceChat("Die now, in a prison of ice!");
                                    npcs[i].forceAnim(6986);//barrage?
                                    npcs[i].attackType = 2;
                                    if (c.freezeTimer <= 0){
                                    c.freezeTimer = 15;
                            c.gfx0(369);
                            c.sendMessage("You have been frozen.");
                            }
                           }
                    } else if (n5 == 1) { //Smoke Barrage
                            if(npcs[i].HP <= 25000 && npcs[i].HP >= 22500) {
                                    npcs[i].forceChat("Fill My Soul With Smoke!");
                                    c.getPA().appendPoison(160);
                                    c.gfx0(391);
                                    npcs[i].attackType = 1;
                                            c.sendMessage("Nomad fills your lungs with a deathly smoke.");
                            }
                    } else if (n5 == 2) { //Shadow Barrage
                            if(npcs[i].HP <= 20000 && npcs[i].HP >= 17500) {
                                    npcs[i].forceChat("Embrace Darkness!");
                                    c.gfx0(382);
                                    npcs[i].attackType = 1;
                                    c.getPA().walkableInterface(12418);
                                            c.sendMessage("You're encased in a unholy shadow.");
                            }
                    } else if (n5 == 3) { //Blood Barrage
                            if(npcs[i].HP <= 10000 && npcs[i].HP >= 7500) {
                                    npcs[i].HP += 185;
                                    npcs[i].attackType = 2;
                                    c.gfx0(377);
                                    c.sendMessage("Nomad Saps your health and increases his own.");
                            }
                    } else if (n5 == 4) { //Turmoil
                            if(npcs[i].HP <= 5000 && npcs[i].HP >= 1000) {
                                    npcs[i].forceAnim(6326);//turm
                                    npcs[i].forceChat("There is...NO ESCAPE!");
                                    npcs[i].hitDelayTimer += 2;
                            }
                    } else if (n5 == 5) { //Wrath
                            if(npcs[i].HP <= 200 && npcs[i].HP >= 0) {
                                    npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee
                                    npcs[i].forceChat("Feel The Wrath Of ZAROS!!");
                                    npcs[i].attackType = 1;
                                    npcs[i].forceAnim(2259);//Wrath
                                    c.gfx0(2260);
                                    c.playerLevel[3] -= wrathDamage;
                                    c.handleHitMask(wrathDamage);
                                    c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
                            }
                    } else if (n5 == 6) { //Normal Attack
                            npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee
                            npcs[i].attackType = 0;       
                    } else if (n5 == 7) { //First!
                            if(npcs[i].HP <= 30000 && npcs[i].HP >= 29900) {
                                    npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee
                                    npcs[i].forceChat("AT LAST!!!!");
                                    npcs[i].attackType = 1;
                            }

Here’s my errors:
src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:592: error: not a statement
returen 12696;
^
src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:592: error: ‘;’ expected
returen 12696;
